<h1 align="center">
  Visualizing Design Token Abstraction
</h1>

## ğŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Install dependencies.**

    First, make sure that node and npm are installed. Then navigate into the project's directory and install dependencies.

    ```shell
    npm install
    ```

2.  **Build visualization.**

    Second, run the following command to build the project.

    ```shell
    npm run build
    ```

3.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    Third, serve the built project onto a local server!

    ```shell
    npm run serve
    ```

    The visualization should now be running at `http://localhost:9000`!
